title: Stabilize UI launch tests in non-authorized environments
description:
Command line invocation:
    /Applications/Xcode-26.3.0-Release.Candidate.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/xcodebuild -project TicketParty.xcodeproj -scheme TicketParty -destination platform=macOS test

Resolve Package Graph

Package: ticketparty

Package: unknown currently fails because UITest launch tests call  and the runner is not authorized for those UI testing actions in this environment. Update tests to skip appearance toggles when unavailable, or gate those assertions behind an authorization check so full-suite runs are reliable.
